original_text:
Yet she was taken captive
    and went into exile.
Her infants were dashed to pieces
    at every street corner.
Lots were cast for her nobles,
    and all her great men were put in chains.
korean_text: 그가 포로가 되어 사로잡혀 갔고 그의 어린 아이들은 길 모퉁이 모퉁이에 메어침을 당하여 부서졌으며 그의 존귀한 자들은 제비 뽑혀 나뉘었고 그의 모든 권세자들은 사슬에 결박되었나니

sentences.original_text: Her infants were dashed to pieces
Lots were cast for her nobles
and all her great men were put in chains
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀의 모든 위대한 사람들이 쇠사슬에 묶였다
